title: The World of life: a journal of the outdoors. Issue No. 7
creator_credit: Countryman Films, John Taylor, Grahame Tharp and Leon Clore
brief_description: Magazine film containing the following items - This Air - experiment of the effect of rarefied atmosphere on the human body; Two hoots - a domesticated barn owl; Rocky Cradle - he life of a grey seal. From the series “World of Life” issue no 7.
